story.title: Why ConnectStar exists? A Divine Revelation

paragraphs.p1: At the end of 2024, God spoke to me on WhatsApp.
paragraphs.p2quote: "Mitch, WhatsApp sells people's data. And it won't stop there."
paragraphs.p3b: "Lord, what do you want me to do?"
paragraphs.p3d: "I want you to develop an alternative to WhatsApp, but for Christians. I want my people to stop using WhatsApp."
paragraphs.p4b: "Alright Lord, give me the intelligence to create it."
paragraphs.p4d: "Lord, what will the app be called?"
paragraphs.p5d: "When I spoke to Abraham, I told him: look at the sky and count the stars. That's what ConnectStar means: Connected to the ends of the earth."
paragraphs.p6: Thus, God inspired and guided me in creating this app. My long-term goal is that all Christians who know and serve Jesus leave WhatsApp, to gather on ConnectStar.
paragraphs.p7: We know that in the times to come, nothing will truly be secure anymore. If, like me, you desire to change things, join this new adventure and help improve it.
paragraphs.p8: The app will be in beta version: some things will need to be perfected, so don't hesitate to contact me to share your suggestions.

header.title: Frequently asked questions
header.description: Still have questions? We're here to help.

questions.question: Why did God call you to create ConnectStar?
questions.answer: At the beginning of 2025, God spoke to me clearly on WhatsApp which sells His people's data. He told me: 'Mitch, I want you to develop an app for Christians.' ConnectStar was born from this divine revelation to protect and unite the Body of Christ.

questions.question: What does the name 'ConnectStar' mean?
questions.answer: God reminded me of His promise to Abraham: 'look at the sky and count the stars.' ConnectStar means: Connected to the ends of the earth. It's a divine vision of worldwide unity of Christians.

questions.question: Is ConnectStar really free?
questions.answer: Yes, ConnectStar will always be completely free for all users. No subscription, no hidden fees. It's a divine mission, not a commercial one.

questions.question: What is this surprise feature üéÅ?
questions.answer: It's a revolutionary innovation that I developed especially for ConnectStar! I can't reveal it yet, but it will transform your spiritual experience. The first subscribers will discover it exclusively.

questions.question: When will the app be available?
questions.answer: ConnectStar will be launched in beta version at the end of 2025. Members of the waitlist will have priority access and test all features in advance.

questions.question: Will the app have bugs in beta version?
questions.answer: Yes, like any app in development. Unlike WhatsApp, I don't have their funding, but with your help and feedback, we will perfect ConnectStar together.

questions.question: How can I support the development of ConnectStar?
questions.answer: ConnectStar is developed without compensation out of passion for the Body of Christ. You can help us through your prayers, by sharing the project, and soon through voluntary donations to cover server costs and accelerate development.

questions.question: Why do you need donations?
questions.answer: I've been developing ConnectStar for free for months to fulfill God's word. Donations will help pay for servers, improve infrastructure and enable faster development to serve the Body of Christ more effectively.

questions.question: Can ConnectStar really replace WhatsApp?
questions.answer: That's the vision God gave me! My long-term goal is that all Christians who know and serve Jesus leave WhatsApp to gather on ConnectStar. Together, we can make it happen.
